pageTitle: Hotel Costa Dourada – Viseu | 5 Star Dão
heroSubtitle: Your 5-Star Retreat in the Heart of Dão.
welcomeText: Hotel Costa Dourada – Viseu is a 5-star hotel with a contemporary style, inspired by the serenity and beauty of the Dão landscapes. We combine modern comfort, excellence in regional gastronomy, and luxurious facilities for an unforgettable stay.
roomsDescription: Your rest is our priority. Choose your view and your comfort.
suiteDãoDescription: Panoramic view over Viseu, living room, and private balcony.
superiorSerraDescription: Stunning view of the Caramulo Mountain Range. Ideal for couples.
standardHistoricDescription: Urban view, essential comfort. Perfect for short stays.
diningDescription: Our cuisine is a tribute to the Beira region, reinvented. Dão-Lafões products and the best Dão Wines are highlighted.
spaDescription: Relax and revitalize. A sanctuary of tranquility with the purity of the Serra da Estrela.
viseuDiscoverDescription: We are perfectly located to explore the cultural and natural richness of Central Portugal.
activity1Description: History and art in the heart of the Historic Center, just minutes from the hotel.
activity2Description: Enjoy the longest ecopista in Portugal, ideal for bike rides or walks.
activity3Description: Discover local wineries and delight in the acclaimed Dão wines.
